testimonials.text: Thank you so much for your hard work during the last two months. We are happy to see how much you have grown in such a short time. Your dedication and hard work helped you take your knowledge to the next level, and such dedication deserves to be rewarded. To honor your hard work, we at Programming Hero decided to give you a recommendation letter so that you can showcase your learning with pride.We hope that this recommendation letter will help you to always look back at those two months and inspire you to work hard so that you can overcome any challenges with the highest confidence. Best wishes for your future adventures!
